item.title: [FLINK-21318] ExecutionContextTest.testCatalogs fail

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: lirui Do you mind having a look? It might be some problem with Hive dependencies.
Does this failure happen in the JDK11 test? Hive in general doesn't run with JDK11. We might need to disable these tests in that case.
Yes, it happens with JDK 11. Could you prepare a pull request to disable it on JAVA 11? You can use @Category(FailsOnJava11.class) annotation for that.
